welcome.title: Welcome
welcome.subtitle: We hope you enjoy the event

suspend.confirm_message: Are you sure you want to suspend the event? No team will be able to perform tests until reactivated.
suspend.event_suspended_message: The event has been temporarily suspended. No tests can be performed at this time.
suspend.reactivate_message: Are you sure you want to reactivate the event? Teams will be able to perform tests again.

session_control.title: Session Control
session_control.subtitle: Manage event sessions and devices
session_control.confirm_clear_local: Are you sure you want to clear the local session? All data saved on this device will be removed.
session_control.no_associated_teams: No teams are associated with devices
session_control.confirm_disassociate: Are you sure you want to disassociate team "{{teamName}}" from its device?

activity_not_implemented: This type of activity is not yet implemented
photo_instruction: Take a photo to complete this test
video_instruction: Record a video to complete this test
or_upload_file: Or upload a file from your device
invalid_image_file: Please select a valid image file
invalid_video_file: Please select a valid video file
activity_proximity_text: You are near the activity "{{activityName}}"! Do you want to start it?
activity_success: Congratulations! You have successfully completed the activity
activity_failure: Sorry, you have not completed the activity
pending_review_message: Your answer has been submitted successfully. The organizer will review your answer and assign the corresponding points.
pending_review_note: You will receive points once the organizer has reviewed your answer.

pairs.success_message: Congratulations! You have found all the pairs.
pairs.no_images: No images found for the pairs game

word_relations.instructions: Tap one word from each column to connect related words
word_relations.success_message: Congratulations! You have connected all words correctly.

gadgets.title: Gadgets
gadgets.description: Gadgets help you complete activities. Some require points to unlock.
gadgets.admin_description: Here you can manage the gadgets available to teams.

valorate.title: Rate Activities
valorate.no_pending_desc: No activities requiring manual review have been completed yet, or all activities have already been reviewed
valorate.question: Question
valorate.test_completed: This activity was completed automatically (test question)
valorate.media_instruction: Review the multimedia content uploaded by the team for this activity.
valorate.media_note: To view the complete multimedia content, access the server file system or database.
valorate.points_description: Enter the points to award to the team for this activity (0 to mark as reviewed without points)
valorate.points_awarded: {{points}} points have been awarded to team {{team}}
valorate.points_updated: Activity points have been updated. Total awarded: {{points}} points
valorate.activity_reviewed: The activity has been marked as reviewed
valorate.already_valued_desc: This activity has already been rated and reviewed previously.
valorate.edit_valued_desc: This activity has already been rated. You can modify the awarded points if necessary.
valorate.review_note: You can review the content, but the activity is already marked as completed.

photo_management.title: Photo/Video Management
photo_management.no_activities_desc: No photo or video activities have been completed yet
